divs: sighting detailsmy wife and i are smokers so we went outside to smoke a cigarette. she immediately said "what the hell is that?" i have nothing in the mental rolodex to identify this object against, hence the reason i am actually taking the time to post this. this interaction freaked us out and i can't come up with a good reason for what we witnessed. it moved front\back side to side and vertically up and down instantly. i know spacial awareness can play tricks on the mind ... i don't think this was that. the object seemed large and fast and changed directions on a dime. if it were some type of remote vehicle, considering how bright and how big and how fast it was, if it were rc i would have heard something. i flew rc as kid and am familiar with even extreme rc. this was freaky and unlike anything i've ever seen. my wife and i couldn't stop talking about it. if it wasn't something i could explain away (which is my inclination) i wouldn't have taken the time to post it here. i'm hoping you can tell me i saw something normal ....
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Simi Valley
There were no other sightings in Simi Valley on or around November 11th 2013
Summary: Unknown blue/red lights on chaotic trajectory
